:mod:`ga4gh.refget.serverless.cls.http.status_codes`
====================================================

.. py:module:: ga4gh.refget.serverless.cls.http.status_codes

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Defines the StatusCodes class, which references http status code
   numbers by name



Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: StatusCodes

   Bases: :class:`object`

   References http status code numbers by name

   .. attribute:: OK
      :annotation: = 200

      

   .. attribute:: PARTIAL_CONTENT
      :annotation: = 206

      

   .. attribute:: REDIRECT_FOUND
      :annotation: = 302

      

   .. attribute:: BAD_REQUEST
      :annotation: = 400

      

   .. attribute:: NOT_FOUND
      :annotation: = 404

      

   .. attribute:: NOT_ACCEPTABLE
      :annotation: = 406

      

   .. attribute:: REQUESTED_RANGE_NOT_SATISFIABLE
      :annotation: = 416

      

   .. attribute:: NOT_IMPLEMENTED
      :annotation: = 501

      

   .. method:: is_successful_code(status_code)
      :staticmethod:


      Checks whether a status code is one of several successful codes

      :param status_code: status code to check
      :type status_code: int
      :return: True if code is in successful code set, otherwise False
      :rtype: bool
